card.title: Pope Francis?
card.body: He’s talking tough on clergy sexual abuse, but is he just another papal pervert protector? (thumbs down) or a true pedophile punishing pontiff? (thumbs up)

kaney-west.name: Kanye West
kaney-west.content: Vestibulum diam ante, porttitor a odio eget, rhoncus neque. Aenean eu velit libero.
